interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten Review Date: 2022/07/17 Store: Vitamasques Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'} Review Text: This jelly facial cleanser from Vitamasques is made in Korea.

The tube has a foil safety seal under the white cap. The cleanser is brown with a jelly-like consistency. It does have a scent, a mix of green tea and tea tree oil. I do notice the scent when using the cleanser but the scent doesn’t linger.

A small drop is enough to wash my face and neck. It doesn’t make a lot of lather but does feel silky going on the skin. I really like the consistency of it.

And I really like how well the cleanser works! It cleaned two layers of sunscreen grime and sweat off my face. Some face washes don’t remove all the sunscreen residue, and I have to keep washing my face or use an exfoliating scrub. This cleanser? One wash and done. I was amazed by how well it worked.

I’m in my 30s, white, with sensitive combination skin. The cleanser did not irritate my face at all. Review Title: Gentle effectie cleanser, made in Korea Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Water Flosser Cordless Oral Irrigator Portable Rechargeable Dental Flossers with 5 Modes & 6 Tips Water Flossing with 300ml Water Tank for Home and Travel, Braces & Bridges Care (Blue) Duomishu {'Brand': 'Duomishu', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Tank Volume': '300 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 5 x 3.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'hf-6', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '786738939194', 'Manufacturer': 'Duomishu'} If you’ve never used a water flosser before, there’s a definite learning curve. Expect to get wet the first few times, if not more. The learning curve and mess is worth it -- my mouth generally feels cleaner after using one -- but I don’t love this particular model.

I wanted a water flosser that wouldn’t take up a lot of space on my bathroom counter. This one is a sort of all-in-one, with the reservoir built into the handle, but I kept getting water bubbles in the tank/tip, which made flossing take a lot longer.

There’s only 3 speeds: low, medium, and high. The low is quite low. And because of where the speed switch button is, it’s really easy to accidentally switch speeds while using the flosser.

The flosser charges via USB, but with a proprietary end (not A or C or anything like that). Cordless Water Flosser Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm - Set of 2, 0.25oz - Nourishing Herbal Lip Elixir with 100% Natural and Certified Organic Ingredients Pharmacopia {'Brand': 'Pharmacopia', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '087819800366'} I spend 99% of my life with chapped lips, so I’m always looking for a chapstick or lip balm that will actually work.

I was intrigued by the hemp oil in the Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm. But not all of the ingredients are listed in the product information. I am allergic to beeswax, which is the second ingredient in the lip balm. So I was unable to use it.

I’m including a picture of the tube, but for reference, here are the ingredients: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, beeswax/cire d’abeille, olea europaea (extra virgin olive) oil, aroma (flavor), cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), aloe barbadensis. Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types Cancun Collection {'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '6.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986671'} Kale Leaf Extract (Brassica Oleracea Acephala) is the 14th ingredient listed out of 23 for the Cancun Collection Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion. This lotion is made in Canada.

The lotion absorbed quickly into my skin, but did leave behind a slightly tacky feel for about 5 minutes after application.

It’s currently the middle of winter where I am, so I was able to see just how moisturizing the lotion is for me when I already had dry skin. The lotion has a medium-weight consistency and gets the job done for about half the day.

What I don’t like about this lotion is the scent. The scent is subtle, sort of like vanilla coconut, and it’s fine at first. But the scent lingers for several hours, and after that time, I’ve had enough of it. Cancun Collection Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle WORKMAN'S FRIEND {'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'} For me, I like the Hand Cleaner and Barrier Cream the most in this bundle. I found that the Superior Healing Hand Cream was just average. These products might seem dude oriented, but they work for anyone.

Superior Hand Cleaner with Activated Charcoal (individually 4/5 stars):
--Works great to remove grease and odors. I like the pumice in the cleanser, as it gives me a real clean, scrubby feeling.

Superior Barrier Skin Cream (individually 4/5 stars):
--Actually does help prevent grease or oil from staining my hands. Also helps keep my fingernails from becoming a dirt mess when I weed without gloves. But doesn’t provide much of a moisturizing effect.

Superior Healing Hand Cream (individually 3/5 stars):
--Truly unscented hand lotion. But it’s just average as a lotion -- it took a few days of 2-3x per day applications to help heal my cracked hands. Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast Tame the Beast {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'} A friendly word of warning: don’t use Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash down south unless you like tingly body parts.

The consistency of the body wash is a little watery, so it’s easy to squeeze out more than you might want. It lathers well and rinses clean without leaving behind a residue.

I really like the smell of the body wash. It’s a strong, crisp scent that really does wake you up. My nose tingled the first time I smelled it. The scent is hard to describe. I can’t pick out any individual notes, just a crisp smell that made me go “Wow, this smells cool and different.” Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) CIMIY {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} The description for this Aloe Vera Gel by CIMIY Skin Care confuses me a little. One of the uses suggested by the manufacturer is to put the gel on before going outside, “which can protect skin from sunburns.” This gel has hyaluronic acid listed as an ingredient, which can actually make skin even more sensitive to UV rays.

Aloe Vera is great for soothing sunburns *after* exposure. This gel absorbed into my skin after about a minute, without leaving behind a sticky or tacky feeling. I’ve used some aloe vera gels that have left me a sticky mess, but not this one. So I like the quick absorption.

The gel does have a slight scent to it. It’s a fresh-smelling scent that sticks around for a while.

This Aloe Vera gel would also be great for homemade hand sanitizer.

This gel is manufactured in China. Aloe Vera Gel Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Sdara Skincare {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} This Aloe Vera Gel by Sdara Skincare takes a few minutes to fully absorb into my skin. I worried it would leave behind a sticky feeling, since I could feel it on my arm the whole time it took to dry. But once the gel finally absorbed, I couldn’t feel any residue left behind. I didn’t notice much of any scent either, which is another positive for me.

The gel is clear; the plastic bottle is amber colored to help keep light out. I wish the bottle had a flip top or squeeze lid instead of a screw off cap.

The list of ingredients is what gives me pause. I’m not sure why sodium bicarbonate (baking soda) would need to be added to the organic aloe leaf juice. The product description mentions “we perfected our serum by enriching with Vitamin E, & Citric Acid for improved nutrient absorption.” I don’t see Vitamin E listed in the ingredients.

I will probably end up using this aloe vera gel to make hand sanitizer. The gel is thick, so it should be good for that use. Aloe Vera Gel 10ML Cedarwood Essential Oil 100% Pure Natural Undiluted Therapeutic Grade Perfect for Aromatherapy, Relaxation, Skin Therapy Cleaning SWEETVALLY {'Brand': 'SWEETVALLY', 'Scent': 'Cedarwood', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Drop', 'Package Dimensions': '2.6 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VR00032968'} I tried the Cedarwood Essential Oil from Sweetvally. The oil is so strong that I smelled it even before removing it from the box or breaking the seal on the bottle. The bottle is tiny but mighty, I guess!

The oil almost pours out from the bottle, so be careful when adding this to a diffuser or anything else. I accidentally added too much to my diffuser the first time I tried it, because the oil dripped out so quickly.

The cedarwood scent is very woodsy. I personally find the scent calming. I read it can also help keep insects away.

The bottle says the extraction method is steam distilled, but does not say where the oil was distilled or anything regarding the country of origin. Very strong 1800 Watt Hair Dryer with Diffuser Hot and Cool Settings 2 Speed Adjustable Negative Ionic Hair Blow Dryer 2 Smoothing Concentrators and 1 Hair Scalp Massager Shampoo Brush for Curly Hair,Woman,Kids Lassie {'Brand': 'Lassie', 'Wattage': '2000 watts', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Massage, Hot, Blow', 'Included Components': 'Diffuser, Concentrator', 'Product Dimensions': '11.4 x 9.4 x 3.7 inches; 2.43 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Lassie'} The look of the Lassie hair dryer is what caught my eye first. It just looks cool! I have the PinkGray color. The gray is a medium shade with a smooth finish that won’t pick up hairs and dust. The pink is a metallic magenta that really pops.

The speed controls are on the handle. The slide button doesn’t move easily, so there’s not a big chance of accidentally changing the speed/temperature without meaning to. On the back of the handle is the option for either cool or hot temperature.

The hair dryer doesn’t dry my hair any faster than any other hair dryer I’ve used. But I like that I can set the temperature to cool to lessen damage and not have to hold in a cool shot button.

The hair dryer isn’t as lightweight as some plastic models I’ve used, but it’s weighted pretty well. The weight of it is distributed evenly on both sides of the handle.

The attachments have little tabs that line up with notches on the nozzle, and then you twist them to lock them in place. I like it -- there’s less chance of them popping off while I use the hair dryer.

The bottom of the hair dryer says the rated power is 1800 watt, which is contrary to the description which says it is 2000 watt. Looks cool and works well Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} This pack of 16 nail files from Keiby Citom is a great value.

I started doing dip nails at home, and the worst part is getting off the old manicure. I have to file off the layers of top coat, which can take a while if I don’t have a good file. I prefer a glass file for actually shaping my nails, but they’re not good for removing layers of polish.

Using one of these files, I had the top coat filed off all my nails in less than ten minutes. The 100 grit side is perfect. I actually asked a nail tech friend what I should use, and she told me 100 grit.

The files come in a zipper seal plastic bag that can be used to store them.

The edges of the files aren’t sharp. I’m talking about the edges that touch your skin; sometimes these can be sharp, especially on pro files, and need to be seasoned to prevent cuts. No problems with that here. Great files Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, Exfoliating Long Silicone Body Back Brush, Handle Scrubbing Pad, Easy to Clean, Lathers Well, Comfortable Massage for Shower(Green) Lnlofen {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 7.44 x 1.93 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803786'} I like one side of this Silicone Back Scrubber from Lnlofen. The “soft brush” side, the one with the longer bristles, works great for scrubbing my back. I can actually feel the bristles move against my skin, and so I feel like I’m getting clean.

The other side, the “stiff brush” side, just slid right over my skin. I didn’t feel the bumps at all.

I’m 5’5” and slender, the back scrubber is long enough for me.

The package includes a hook to hang the brush in the shower, but I just loop it over the shower rail and it dries quickly. The brush can roll up into a compact bundle for storage. One side works, but that's all I need Makeup Headband - 3PCS Spa Headband For Washing Face Skincare Towel Headbands Shower Hair Band Tinpin {'Color': 'Pink,Silver', 'Material': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Brand': 'Tinpin', 'Size': '3 piece Set', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 7.17 x 2.13 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} If I have a choice between a plain headband and a unicorn headband, well, I’m picking the unicorn headband every time!

These headbands are super cute and colorful. The faux fur is soft and doesn’t shed, and really adds to the unicorn aspect. The horns stand up from the headband, and are sparkly silver. The ears don’t stand up as well, they’re a bit floppy, and also have sparkly silver on the backs.

The headbands are on the smaller side. I measured approximately 6 inches across the opening with a headband unstretched, and about 9 inches when fully stretched. I like that the headbands are tight, they stay on my head and hold my hair back. I don’t have to keep fussing with them, they stay in place. They are about 2½ inches wide, which helps with comfort. Cute and functional Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten Vitamasques {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'} This jelly facial cleanser from Vitamasques is made in Korea.

The tube has a foil safety seal under the white cap. The cleanser is brown with a jelly-like consistency. It does have a scent, a mix of green tea and tea tree oil. I do notice the scent when using the cleanser but the scent doesn’t linger.

A small drop is enough to wash my face and neck. It doesn’t make a lot of lather but does feel silky going on the skin. I really like the consistency of it.

And I really like how well the cleanser works! It cleaned two layers of sunscreen grime and sweat off my face. Some face washes don’t remove all the sunscreen residue, and I have to keep washing my face or use an exfoliating scrub. This cleanser? One wash and done. I was amazed by how well it worked.

I’m in my 30s, white, with sensitive combination skin. The cleanser did not irritate my face at all. Gentle effectie cleanser, made in Korea
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health & Hygiene Focus**: The user continues to prioritize oral hygiene, lip care, and body products that refresh and soothe the skin, with recent investments in effective cleansing tools to enhance their skincare routine.

- **Nail Care Consideration**: They are interested in effective nail care tools for at-home manicures, emphasizing functionality and user comfort, especially for polish removal.

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user seeks user-friendly hair care tools with multifunctional capabilities to reduce hair damage while styling.

- **Ingredient Awareness**: They are conscious of allergies and prefer transparent, natural personal care products, critical of vague sourcing and unnecessary additives.

- **Scent Preference**: Sensitive to scents, they enjoy unique, calming fragrances that also offer additional benefits.

- **Portability & Efficiency**: Values compact, travel-friendly designs, maintaining a minimalist approach to personal care with easy-to-use products featuring straightforward controls.

- **Functional Features**: Prefers practical applications and is open to cautiously repurposing products.

- **Charging Convenience**: Shows a preference for USB charging solutions.

- **Skepticism Towards Claims**: Approaches new products with caution, focusing on performance, ingredient transparency, and critically evaluating marketing messages.

- **Aesthetic Appeal**: Recently, the user has developed an appreciation for cute and colorful accessories that enhance their skincare routine, such as effective headbands.

- **Cleansing Efficacy**: The user values gentle yet effective cleansers that thoroughly remove sunscreen and impurities without irritation, highlighting a preference for products with soothing, non-irritating properties suitable for sensitive skin.
